episode_event_ch0137_orchid/4001_1001_01:
Wow... I didn’t know Professor Oak was
THIS strong!
episode_event_ch0137_orchid/4001_1001_03: Hoho! I guess I never told you two before.
episode_event_ch0137_orchid/4001_1001_04:
When I was young, I was a serious
Pokémon Trainer!
episode_event_ch0137_orchid/4001_1001_06:
I wonder what it would’ve been like to know you
back then...
episode_event_ch0137_orchid/4001_1001_07: That old duff was tough and handsome.
episode_event_ch0137_orchid/4001_1001_08:
But that was decades ago. He’s a shadow of his
former self now.
episode_event_ch0137_orchid/4001_1001_10:
So, you knew Professor Oak back when he was
really serious?
episode_event_ch0137_orchid/4001_1001_11: Indeed. More than I’d have liked to, actually.
episode_event_ch0137_orchid/4001_1001_12:
As rivals, we used to battle each other a lot to
see which one of us was stronger.
episode_event_ch0137_orchid/4001_1001_13:
WOW! Professor Oak was rivals with an
Elite Four member?
episode_event_ch0137_orchid/4001_1001_14: Hahaha, it’s a story of the past now!
episode_event_ch0137_orchid/4001_1001_15:
So that’s why you’re so good at battling with
Nidorino—it’s because you’ve trained a lot over
the years!
episode_event_ch0137_orchid/4001_1001_16:
I was surprised, because Nidorino can’t use as
many moves as Nidoking.
episode_event_ch0137_orchid/4001_1001_17:
Oh ho... You’ve been studying well. I see what
the old duff sees in you.
episode_event_ch0137_orchid/4001_1001_19:
If you want to keep winning, I’d say you ought to
evolve your Pokémon.
episode_event_ch0137_orchid/4001_1001_21:
Why haven’t you evolved your Nidorino,
Professor Oak?
episode_event_ch0137_orchid/4001_1001_23: The main reason is for Pokémon research!
episode_event_ch0137_orchid/4001_1001_24:
It goes without saying that Nidorino and Nidoking
are different Pokémon.
episode_event_ch0137_orchid/4001_1001_25:
As a researcher, I need to know the strengths and
best ways of battling with Nidorino...
episode_event_ch0137_orchid/4001_1001_26: AND the best ways of battling with Nidoking!
episode_event_ch0137_orchid/4001_1001_27:
So, I’m now researching what’s great about
Nidorino by being partners with him.
episode_event_ch0137_orchid/4001_1001_32:
We should also get stronger by finding our
partners’ unique strength!
episode_event_ch0137_orchid/4001_1001_34:
Well, well... I guess you both decided to take it
easy like that old duff. Best of luck to you anyway.
